title: Production, characterization and environmental remediation application of emerging phosphorus-rich biochar/hydrochar: a comprehensive review
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,33649-33665
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03333G, Review Article

Qilong Ge, ChunJuan Dong, GuoYing Wang, Jing Zhang, Rui Hou
Owing to the high carbon and phosphorus contents, large specific surface area and slow-release of available P, P-rich biochar/hydrochar (CHAR) have drawn global attention.
